name: Laptop Search
description: Schema for searching laptops with specific requirements: slim, light, >32GB RAM, <15 inches, available in Germany, budget 1500€

source_url.description: URL where the laptop listing was found

vendor_name.description: Name of the vendor/retailer selling the laptop

brand.description: Laptop manufacturer brand (e.g., Dell, HP, Lenovo, Apple)

model_name.description: Specific model name of the laptop

cpu_type.description: CPU model and specifications (e.g., Core i7-13700H, Ryzen 7 7840U)

gpu_type.description: GPU model and specifications (e.g., RTX 4060, Radeon 780M, Integrated)

ram_size.description: RAM capacity (must be >32GB as per requirement)

disk_size.description: Storage capacity and type (e.g., 1TB SSD, 512GB NVMe)

screen_size.description: Screen diagonal size (must be <15 inches as per requirement)

weight.description: Laptop weight (should be light as per requirement)

thickness.description: Laptop thickness/profile (should be slim as per requirement)

availability.description: Availability status in Germany (In Stock, Out of Stock, Pre-order, etc.)

meets_requirements.description: Whether this laptop meets all specified requirements

prompt: Search for slim and light laptops available in Germany with more than 32GB RAM, screen size less than 15 inches, and price under 1500€. Extract detailed specifications including CPU, GPU, storage, and availability information. Verify that each laptop meets the specified requirements before including it in results.
